sentences.sentence: Performance improvement between 4-kilobyte pages and other supported page sizes
sentences.translation: KB 页面与其他受支持的页面大小之间的性能提升

sentences.sentence: The cost of storing or transmitting a kilobyte of data really is now too cheap to meter.
sentences.translation: 存储和传递一千字节数据的成本现在便宜到可以忽略不计，这种事情真的在发生。

sentences.sentence: Performance improved of 5% with the 64-kilobyte pages as compared to the 4-kilobyte pages.
sentences.translation: 与使用 4 KB 的页面相比，使用 64 KB 的页面可以使性能提高 5%。
